entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 8:40 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:40 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening. Forecast issued 8:40 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
